name: prop-types-callable
description: Runtime type checking for React props and similar objects.

scripts.umd: NODE_ENV=development browserify src/index.js -t envify --standalone PropTypes -o build/prop-types.js
scripts.umd-min: NODE_ENV=production browserify src/index.js -t envify --standalone PropTypes -o | uglifyjs --compress unused,dead_code -o build/prop-types.min.js
scripts.build: mkdir -p build && yarn umd && yarn umd-min
